title.rendered: Online MBA Program at Durham University

content.rendered:
If you ever wish to enroll MBA program in a reputable University in UK, Here is an opportunity for you. Durham University provide Full-time and Online MBA Program for students across the globe. If you are interested, get tips below.

Contents on This Page

Toggle
  • What is Online MBA at Durham University
  • Benefits of Studying Online MBA Program at Durham University
  • Online MBA Requirements at Durham University
      • Full-time MBA
      • Durham-EBS Executive MBA
      • MBA (online)
      • MBA (Finance) (online)
  • Durham University Contacts

Let’s begin.

What is Online MBA at Durham University

The Durham Online MBA at Durham University is a full-time, 12-month programme that is designed to help you develop the skills and knowledge you need to succeed in a global business environment. The programme is taught by a team of experienced academics and business professionals, and it offers a wide range of modules, including finance, marketing, strategy, and leadership.

The MBA at Durham University is accredited by the Association to Advance Collegiate Schools of Business (AACSB), which is the world’s premier business school accreditation body. This accreditation means that the programme meets the highest standards of academic excellence.

The MBA at Durham University is also ranked highly by the Financial Times, which is one of the world’s leading business publications. In the 2024 Financial Times Global MBA Ranking, the Durham MBA was ranked 8th in the UK and 23rd in Europe.

If you are looking for a top-ranked MBA programme that will give you the skills and knowledge you need to succeed in a global business environment, then the MBA at Durham University is a great option.

Benefits of Studying Online MBA Program at Durham University

Here are some of the benefits of studying for an MBA at Durham University:

  • A world-class business school: Durham University Business School is ranked among the top business schools in the world.
  • A strong academic reputation: The MBA at Durham University is accredited by the AACSB, which is the world’s premier business school accreditation body.
  • A diverse and international student body: The MBA at Durham University attracts students from all over the world, which provides you with the opportunity to learn from and network with people from different cultures.
  • A strong alumni network: Durham University has a strong alumni network of over 100,000 graduates, which can provide you with valuable support and guidance after you graduate.

If you are interested in applying for the MBA at Durham University, you can find more information on the university’s website.

Online MBA Requirements at Durham University

Full-time MBA

Duration 12 or 15 months
Intake September
Cost £25,000
Admission Requirements
  • An Upper Second Class Bachelor Degree or international equivalent
  • Minimum of three years (preferably five) of work experience
  • Interview
  • Resume
  • English test results: TOEFL or IELTS (if applicable)

Durham-EBS Executive MBA

Two-year program offered in partnership with the European Business School (EBS) in Germany. Courses are delivered over the course of three semesters in Oestrich-Winkel, Germany. The program features two weeklong residencies and optional electives in Durham, UK and an optional international study tour.
Courses are taught in English.

Duration 24 months
Intake January
Cost Euro 32,500
Admission Requirements
  • An Upper Second Class Bachelor Degree or international equivalent
  • Minimum of three years (preferably five) of work experience
  • English test results: TOEFL or IELTS (if applicable)

MBA (online)

Students can complete the program either entirely online or through a combination of online modules and block-taught residential modules.

Courses are taught in English.

Duration 3 years
Intake April, October
Cost £19,000
Admission Requirements
  • An Upper Second Class Bachelor Degree or international equivalent
  • Minimum of three years (preferably five) of work experience
  • Two references
  • Resume
  • English test results (if applicable)
  • Copy of your degree certificate (if applicable)

MBA (Finance) (online)

Students can complete the program either entirely online or through a combination of online modules and block-taught residential modules.
Courses are taught in English.

Intake April, October
Cost £19,000
Admission Requirements
  • An Upper Second Class Bachelor Degree or international equivalent
  • Minimum of three years (preferably five) of work experience
  • Two references
  • Resume
  • English test results (if applicable)
  • Copy of your degree certificate (if applicable)
